Google couched the announcement in terms of management clarity and efficiency( We'll operate and execute even better in Eric Schmidt 's words), but the real need is to reestablish the entrepreneurial drive that is propelling Facebook. He explained on a forthcoming episode of "Oprah Presents Master Class': I asked a very successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' and he said,` Simon Cowell , always know when to leave the fair.' And I think that's good advice. Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go.' Without any regrets whatsoever. Despite departing` American Idol', Simon Cowell - who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year- insists he has enjoyed being a TV talent show judge because it isn"t very difficult.

I don't know how I'm going to tell people they suck'. "Something inside you just says, "You know what, it's time to go'," Simon Cowell added. Without any regrets. I can look back on the past 10 years and say it's been a blast. I've enjoyed myself. I mean, it's not the most difficult job in the world is it? Rangers. There's no surprise in the Simon Cowell that Rushfield presents, but he does bring him to life-- by turns brilliant and exasperating, self-serving and disarmingly honest. Rushfield sums him up well: If ever a person could be prepared for fame and all that came with it, it was Simon Cowell ... For 20 years, Simon Cowell had been involved in every aspect of the shadowy business of creating stars... He had seen how the magical alchemy could transform people into stars, and he had seen how it could go wrong. The book is not Fox-authorized, which may explain why the show's other well-known personalities play only supporting roles. Paula Abdul is a wacky sparring partner, and Ryan Seacrest is Robin to Simon Cowell 's Batman. Nevermind

ik hebben een hoop gesproken over hoe de we management structuur eenvoudiger kunnen maken en beslissingen kunnen versnellen. Afgelopen kerst hebben we besloten dat dit het beste moment is om structurele veranderingen aan te brengen." De afgelopen 10 jaar hebben we allemaal een rol gehad bij het nemen van besluiten. Deze trojka heeft grote voordelen vanwege de gezamenlijke kennis, en we zullen belangrijke besluiten daarom ook gedrieÃ«n blijven bespreken. Maar we zijn het ook er ook over eens dat we onze individuele rollen duidelijker moeten afbakenen en dat er een duidelijke verantwoordelijkheid en aansprakelijkheid nodig is aan de top van het bedrijf. Beurskoers stijgt Google maakte de wisseling na sluiting van de beurs bekend. In de nabeurshandel steeg het aandeel met 2 procent.
